Title: The Peak of Serenity - Begin Your Training
Description: The time has come for you to venture to the Peak of Serenity to begin training in the ways of the Monk.  Use Zen Pilgrimage to go there and speak with Master Hight when you arrive.
ObjectivesText: Use Zen Pilgrimage to travel to the Peak of Serenity.  Speak to Master Hight in the Shrine of the Ox when you arrive.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Master Hight in the Shrine of the Ox.
